About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hi, my name is Jaron Mitchell. I'm a java developer that recently graduated with a Bachelor's in Computer Science. I'm a highly creative, forward thinging developer with a multi-faceted background in user experience, front-end/back-end development and responsive design/programming for both static and dynamically loaded content.

Education

University of Central Missouri

B.S. Computer Science - 2018
